unit.disband.tooltip.description: Click to <style="status">Disband</style> this Follower and remove them from the game. This will release their slot and any associated Blessings attached to the Follower will be sent back to your <style="value">Discard</style> pile. This action is not reversible.

unit.disband.confirm.content:
Do you want to <style="status">Disband</style> the Follower from your troup?

This will release their slot and any associated Blessings attached to the Follower will be sent back to your <style="value">Discard</style> pile. This action is not reversible.

This Follower is <style="wound">Wounded</style>.

If you have Healing points you can click to Heal this Follower. The cost is <style="value">1 point</style> per Follower <style="value">Level</style> per <style="wound">Wound</style>.

Ex: A Follower level <style="value">2</style> with <style="wound">1 Wound</style> would cost <style="value">2</style> Healing points. A Follower level <style="value">2</style> with <style="wound">2 wounds</style> would cost <style="value">4</style> Healing points.

units.panel.description:
Followers are permanently accessible to you (unlike Cards) until you remove them or they are <style="status">Destroyed</style> by enemy Attacks or Effects.
You can use them <style="value">once</style> per Day/Night cycle.
They can also be <style="status">Healed</style> when <style="wound">Wounded</style>.

unit.help.name: Followers
unit.help.description: Followers are always-on cards that can be recruited at certain Locations by spending Leadership points. Open the Market to check what Followers are available and where to find them. Once acquired you can activate one of their Abilities once per Round. They will be automatically refreshed at the beginning of the next Round or if you use special abilities to do so earlier
unit.help.refresh.name: Refreshing a Follower
unit.help.refresh.description: A <style="status">Resting / Exhausted</style> Follower cannot be activated and is Refreshed automatically at End of Round or by using special Abilities
